metadataAttributes.Title: Software Design and Architecture Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Mindful Strategies for Quality Software. Think like an expert architect and create quality software using design patterns and principles.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Software Architecture, Java, Software Design Pattern, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Object-Oriented Design, Object-Oriented Analysis And Design, Unified Modeling Language (UML), Web Service, Microservices, Representational State Transfer (REST), Service-Oriented Architecture,
